summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight pH deviation.

insights.recommendation: Monitor pH closely; consider adding buffers to maintain optimal range (6.5-7.5).
Check for excess nutrients; consider partial water changes if TDS continues to rise.
Ensure temperature remains within optimal range (24-28°C) for tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.042 / 7.019 / 7.08 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 311.353 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.708 / 25.25 / 30.06 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
